sentences.en: And the tinkle clink of silverware on china , the hiss and gurgle of the coffee maker.
sentences.cn: 还有陶瓷上银器的清脆的叮当声, 咖啡壶的斯斯声和汩汩声.

sentences.en: He gave a low gurgle of laughter.
sentences.cn: 他发出一阵很低的咯咯的笑声.

sentences.en: He let the coke gurgle down his throat.
sentences.cn: 他咕噜咕噜地喝起了可乐.

sentences.en: Instead, I heard only the sweet, soft gurgle of baby laughter.
sentences.cn: 相反, 我只听到婴儿甜美 、 轻柔的咯咯的笑声.

sentences.en: Please listen to the depths of the season, a sweet - bi voiceless, to gurgle out.
sentences.cn: 请听,季节深处, 一碧甜甜的清音, 汩汩地流出.

sentences.en: Soon the seawater began to gurgle pond gradually became shallower, revealing wet sand on either side.
sentences.cn: 眼看海水向峡口那边汩汩流去,潭水渐浅,露出两面潮湿的水滩.

sentences.en: The fountain flows with a merry gurgle.
The water emptied with a gurgle.
The water went down the plughole with a loud gurgle.
sentences.cn: 水发着响亮的汩汩声流下了排水洞.

sentences.en: There was a gurgle of laughter on the other end of the line.
sentences.cn: 从队伍的另一头传来咯咯的笑声。

sentences.en: Water not clear Cool, Stephen gurgle sound as if singing, all the year round can not.
sentences.cn: 水流不大,清澈沁凉, 汩汩泉声犹如欢歌, 常年不绝.

sentences.en: We could hear the swish and gurgle of water against the hull.
sentences.cn: 我们能听到水拍打船体时的哗哗声。

trans.tran_en: the happy low sound that someone makes in their throat
if water gurgles, it flows along gently with a pleasant low sound

trans.tran_cn: 汨汨地流，作咯咯声，作汩汩声
用咯咯声表示，发出咯咯声
